name: Campbell's Summer of Soup And Sacrifice
name_original: Campbell's Summer of Soup And Sacrifice
description:
Play as a Soup Goblin, selected by The Maw, a swirling horror in the center of Campbell's Tomato Sea, to determine a worthy sacrifice. use your rowing and negotiating skills to travel the Four islands and talk to the many colorful characters. Decide who deserves to be offered up, and bring them to The Maw, to achieve your Soup Goblin destiny!

Controls:

  • WASD/Arrow Keys: Walk Around
  • E/Space: Dock Boat / Talk
  •  D/Right Arrow: Move Right Oar
  •  A/Left Arrow: Move Left Oar
  •  Left Click: Select Dialogue Option
  • R/0: Restart
  • Escape: Exit

Made by Silver Lewis, JohnLee Cooper,  Austin Heller, and nymph for Paint Jam 2021, whose theme was "Campbell Soup (Andy Warhol)".
